publicwhip.spmotion: *S1M-1842 Iain Gray: Draft The Justices of the Peace (Tribunal) (Scotland) Regulations 2001—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft The Justices of the Peace (Tribunal) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 be approved. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace*

S1M-1842 Iain Gray: Draft The Justices of the Peace (Tribunal) (Scotland) Regulations 2001—That the Justice 1 Committee recommends that the draft The Justices of the Peace (Tribunal) (Scotland) Regulations 2001 be approved. Supported by: Mr Jim Wallace
